reviews.review_msg: Levy is a fantastic lecturer and presents the material in an exciting, refreshing way! She is extremely intelligent, helpful, passionate and keeps her discussions interesting! Marking scale is fair and she is always available to help. One of the best english prof's i've had so far! TA's were awesome - I would absolutely recommend Levy as a prof!!!

Levy is a fantastic lecturer and is excellent at allowing students to think differently about the material! Extremely fair marker, so helpful, extremely nice and very intelligent. Presentations were lovely and class discussions very interesting! TA's were excellent, it was one of my favourite courses so far. I would absolutely recommend Dr. Levy!!

Michelle Levy was very out of touch with the needs of university-level students. She very much complicated the uncomplicated and was disorganized and sloppy while demanding too much and providing too little. However, she at least is a surprisingly easy marker for all that she expects and patronizingly overcomplicates and overclarifies.

This was an excellent class!  She included the usual authors and poets, as well as some lesser-knowns.  I had taken a few 19th century lit classes before, so it was a nice change!  For those of you worried about not getting your fill of Wordsworth...don't worry...she does quite a bit of the old boys..+there's WAY more of that in 300-level classes!
